summary: A little mod that allows you to recruit and marry Saadia from the Bannered Mare after you saved her from the Alik'r. Levels with player up to Level 45 and is essential. No other stats or appearance changed. This mod is especially for those who don't want to have an OP follower.
descriptionHtml:
I never liked the fact that Saadia doesn't have any further interest in me after i saved her life and killed a cave full of bandits and Alik'r.

So i made this litte mod that allows you to recruit and even marry her after you completed the quest to get a follower with a background story.

I didn't change her stats, inventory or appearance to keep it immersive.

Requirements: None

Installation: Just put the .ESP in your Load Order or use NMM
author: jesuzz
